#summary Generated list of all scripting functions.
=Events=
 * ontouch
 * ontouching
 * onuntouch
 * onstart
 * onend
 * onpreframe
 * ontick
 * onpostframe
 * onclick
 * ondrag
 * onunclick


=Script functions=

==Simulation variables==
 * setVar(name,value)
 * getVar(name)
 * getSetVar(name,value=0)

==Inputs==
 * key(k)
 * joy(name)
 * joybutton(name)
 * slider(sname,defaultValue=0.5,min=0.0,max=1.0)


==Physics body==
 * push(kick=nil)
 * magnetic=(v)
 * solid=(v)
 * destroy()
 * nocollision=(v)
 * getVelocity()
 * setVelocity(velocity)
 * setLinearDamping(damp)
 * setAngularDamping(damp)
 * getTorque()
 * setTorque(torque)
 * teleport(pos,recurse=true)
 * copy(pos=nil,kick=nil,lifetime=0)
 * split(bdy=self,recurse=0)
 * setCamera

==Utility==
 * findBody(grp)
 * playSound(name)
 * logLine(str)
 * frame()
 * group()
 * camera()
 * position()
 * transformation()
 * simulation()

===Curves===
 * evalCurveAbs(name,dist)
 * getCurveLength(curveVerts)
 * findCurve(name)


==Joints==
 * createJoint(parent,child,type="ball",min=0,max=0,accel=0,damp=0,breakingForce=0)
 * disconnect()
 * attach(child,breakingForce=0)
 * connect(child,type="ball",min=0,max=0,accel=0,damp=0,breakingForce=0)
 * lookAt(target,stiff=10.0,damp=10.0)
